subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN1747 is on the way
description_text:

conversations.body_text: I meant to say the haptics were not in the box.

Hello, It's been a few days and I have not received a response.

On Mon, Jun 30, 2025 at 3:37 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Charith Nikahetiya,  Here's the link to the haptics logistics tracking, delivery expected around the 8th.  https://www.track718.us/en/detail?nums=JSEXM1931453015YQ
